mapper.sql: id, team_id, sign_increment, family_increment, sign_hyper_score, sign_diabetes_score, sign_phychosis_score, sign_old_score, sign_maternal_score, sign_children_score, sign_manage_score, public_health_hyper_score, public_health_diabetes_score, public_health_phychosis_score, public_health_old_score, public_health_maternal_score, public_health_children_score, public_health_score, health_manage_edu_score, health_manage_daily_activity_score, health_manage_assessment_score, health_manage_document_score, health_manage_score, customer_score, result_score, month, create_time
mapper.select:
SELECT AVG(a.sign_hyper_score) sign_hyper_score, AVG(a.sign_diabetes_score) sign_diabetes_score, AVG(a.sign_phychosis_score) sign_phychosis_score, AVG(a.sign_old_score) sign_old_score, AVG(a.sign_maternal_score) sign_maternal_score, AVG(a.sign_children_score) sign_children_score, AVG(a.sign_manage_score) sign_manage_score, AVG(a.public_health_hyper_score) public_health_hyper_score, AVG(a.public_health_diabetes_score) public_health_diabetes_score, AVG(a.public_health_phychosis_score) public_health_phychosis_score, AVG(a.public_health_old_score) public_health_old_score, AVG(a.public_health_maternal_score) public_health_maternal_score, AVG(a.public_health_children_score) public_health_children_score, AVG(a.public_health_score) public_health_score, AVG(a.health_manage_edu_score) health_manage_edu_score, AVG(a.health_manage_daily_activity_score) health_manage_daily_activity_score, AVG(a.health_manage_assessment_score) health_manage_assessment_score, AVG(a.health_manage_document_score) health_manage_document_score, AVG(a.health_manage_score) health_manage_score, AVG(a.customer_score) customer_score FROM t_appraisal_month_team_score a
WHERE a.team_id =#{0}

SELECT a.team_id, a.sign_increment, a.family_increment, a.sign_hyper_score, a.sign_diabetes_score, a.sign_phychosis_score, a.sign_old_score, a.sign_maternal_score, a.sign_children_score, a.sign_manage_score, a.public_health_hyper_score, a.public_health_diabetes_score, a.public_health_phychosis_score, a.public_health_old_score, a.public_health_maternal_score, a.public_health_children_score, a.public_health_score, a.health_manage_edu_score, a.health_manage_daily_activity_score, a.health_manage_assessment_score, a.health_manage_document_score, a.health_manage_score, a.customer_score, a.result_score, a.month, a.create_time,b.doc_name doctor_name FROM t_appraisal_month_team_score a, t_doctor b WHERE a.team_id = b.team_id AND b.leader_flag = "1" and a.`month` =#{0}
mapper.insert: insert into t_appraisal_month_team_score (id, team_id, sign_increment, family_increment, sign_hyper_score, sign_diabetes_score, sign_phychosis_score, sign_old_score, sign_maternal_score, sign_children_score, sign_manage_score, public_health_hyper_score, public_health_diabetes_score, public_health_phychosis_socre, public_health_old_score, public_health_maternal_score, public_health_children_score, public_health_score, health_manage_edu_score, health_manage_daily_activity_score, health_manage_assessment_score, health_manage_document_score, health_manage_score, customer_score, result_socre, month, create_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{teamId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{signIncrement,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{familyIncrement,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{signHyperScore,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{signDiabetesScore,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{signPhychosisScore,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{signOldScore,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{signMaternalScore,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{signChildrenScore,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{signManageScore,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{publicHealthHyperScore,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{publicHealthDiabetesScore,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{publicHealthPhychosisSocre,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{publicHealthOldScore,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{publicHealthMaternalScore,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{publicHealthChildrenScore,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{publicHealthScore,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{healthManageEduScore,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{healthManageDailyActivityScore,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{healthManageAssessmentScore,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{healthManageDocumentScore,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{healthManageScore,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{customerScore,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{resultSocre,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{month,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update:
update t_appraisal_month_team_score
team_id = #{teamId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sign_increment = #{signIncrement,jdbcType=INTEGER},
family_increment = #{familyIncrement,jdbcType=INTEGER},
sign_hyper_score = #{signHyperScore,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
sign_diabetes_score = #{signDiabetesScore,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
sign_phychosis_score = #{signPhychosisScore,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
sign_old_score = #{signOldScore,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
sign_maternal_score = #{signMaternalScore,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
sign_children_score = #{signChildrenScore,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
sign_manage_score = #{signManageScore,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
public_health_hyper_score = #{publicHealthHyperScore,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
public_health_diabetes_score = #{publicHealthDiabetesScore,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
public_health_phychosis_socre = #{publicHealthPhychosisSocre,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
public_health_old_score = #{publicHealthOldScore,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
public_health_maternal_score = #{publicHealthMaternalScore,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
public_health_children_score = #{publicHealthChildrenScore,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
public_health_score = #{publicHealthScore,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
health_manage_edu_score = #{healthManageEduScore,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
health_manage_daily_activity_score = #{healthManageDailyActivityScore,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
health_manage_assessment_score = #{healthManageAssessmentScore,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
health_manage_document_score = #{healthManageDocumentScore,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
health_manage_score = #{healthManageScore,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
customer_score = #{customerScore,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
result_socre = #{resultSocre,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
month = #{month,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
